name: shimmer-tw-v3
title: Shimmer (Tailwind v3)
description: Wrap children with a configurable shimmer loading effect.
docs: Usage: `import { Shimmer } from "@/components/shimmer"` then `Loading...`. Override colors via CSS vars: `[--shimmer-base:theme(colors.gray.900)] [--shimmer-highlight:theme(colors.gray.300)]`.
